snippet: Gift cards are popular to give during the holidays. New research and experts offer insights into what types of cards to buy for friends and relatives, and how to get the best deal.
lead_paragraph: Gift cards are popular to give during the holidays. New research and experts offer insights into what types of cards to buy for friends and relatives, and how to get the best deal.

headline.main: When Buying Gift Cards, Know Your Audience (and Their Age)
